format: A data frame with 919 observations on the following 5 variables:

parameters.county.name: County name - a factor.
parameters.log.radon: Radon measurement (in log pCi/L, i.e., log picoCurie per liter)
parameters.basement:
Indicator for the level of the home at which the radon measurement
was taken - 0 = basement, 1 = first floor.

title: Radon data
description:
Description
Radon measurements of 919 owner-occupied homes in 85 counties of Minnesota.
